name: df-inftm
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cinftm, cmpt(s0, universe, copab(s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cbs, cv(s0)))), wa(wbr(cfv(c0g, cv(s0)), cfv(cplt, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wral(s3, cn, wbr(co(cv(s3), cfv(cmg, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cfv(cplt, cv(s0)), cv(s2))))))))
comment: Define the relation " ` x ` is infinitesimal with respect to ` y ` " for a structure ` w ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2018.)
